answers.answer: I'm taking the 3 hour test now. This is so good to know whether I have it or not.  Definitely worth a try since it's healthy.

question: I have gestational diabetes and I'm 32 weeks pregnant. Just want to share if anyone has GD, take one grapefruit daily after any mealI have it daily after breakfast and it's really amazing I lost 1kg and my sugar level is now normal :)Good luck to all moms!!
title: For all who have GD
